column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last night , I booked my ticket to Boston .
#text=I got on the computer and found the next available train and purchased my ticket .
#text=I packed my bag and printed my purchase confirmation .
#text=This morning , I headed to the train station .
#text=I handed my receipt to the clerk and he handed me my ticket .
#text=My train was scheduled to depart at 8:00 AM .
#text=I checked my watch and saw it was 7:35 AM .
#text=I quickly headed to the gate where my train was .
#text=I approached the gate and handed my ticket over .
#text=I was easily able to board the train .
#text=I found my seat towards the back of the train .
#text=I was happy to have a window seat so I could view the scenery during the trip .
#text=I set my luggage aside and settled into my seat .
#text=The steward came over and asked if I wanted a beverage .
#text=I said I would like a water .
#text=I was impressed with the scenery during the trip .
#text=I also chatted with a few other passengers and enjoyed a quick nap during the trip .
#text=After about two hours , the train arrived at its destination .
#text=I gathered my luggage and got off the train .
